info.name: Google - Albany AMT
info.description:
Changes Google pages to use this font face.  This is for us Linux users.  I use Ubuntu, but I am sure this font comes available with other distros.  If you don't like this font, simply scroll near the bottom of the code and change it to the font that you want.  Based on "Google Tahoma (unified font style) v0.2" found at http://userstyles.org/style/show/178

UPDATES
May 30, 2007: Commented out the code that widens margins in Gmail (toward bottom).  I like using Gmail Air Skin and it was messing with that one big time.

domain("google.co.zw") {
	
	/* applies font to all generic HTML tags */
	*,
        html,
	body,
	span,
	div,
	td,
	br,
	input,
	font,
	button,
	select,
	option {
		font-family: Albany AMT !important;
		font-size: 9pt !important;
	}
	
	/* specifies width of web search results column */
	td.j {
		width: 75% !important;
	}
}
